body.name: Evolur Julienne 5 in 1 Convertible Crib, Antique Grey Mist 55.5x31.2x51.5 Inch (Pack of 1)
features: INSPIRED BY FRENCH COUNTRY ARTISAN CRAFTSMANSHIP: The Julienne is constructed out of kiln-dried hardwood with hardwood veneers and features traditional Lanarkshire wood crown molding, floral leaf square rosettes, fluted post legs and tapered pedestal feet

5-in-1 CONVERTIBILITY: The Julienne converts to a toddler bed with our conversion kit (sold separately) and daybed. Add our wooden bed frame (sold separately) to convert it into a full-size bed. It also features 3 mattress height settings.Care and Cleaning: Spot or Wipe Clean

ALLURING FINISHES TO CHOOSE FROM: The Antique Mist and Cloud finishes feature upholstery on the headboard constructed from beautiful, stain-resistant, woven, linen-like fabric. The Brushed White finish features a full-panel headboard without upholstery

SAFETY FIRST: Our cribs are built to the highest safety standards that meet/exceed those set by the CPSC, JPMA and ASTM. Each of our cribs undergoes rigorous testing by independent laboratories for compliance with all US and Canadian crib regulations

A LIFETIME INVESTMENT: Pick coordinating pieces from our Evolur Julienne Collection like the double dresser, tall chest, hutch/bookcase and nightstand to create a timeless nursery. Crib dimensions are 55.5 L(W) x 31.2 W(D) x 51.5
body.description: Bring a bit of the French countryside inside with the alluring Julienne 5-in-1 Convertible Crib. Inspired by French Country Artisan Craftsmanship, the Julienne features traditional Lanarkshire wood crown molding, floral leaf square rosettes, fluted post legs & tapered pedestal feet. Constructed out of kiln-dried hardwood with hardwood veneers, the Julienne is built to last and is truly a lifetime investment. We believe in creating furniture that adapts to your growing child. The Julienne 5-in-1 Convertible Crib does exactly that. The Julienne features 3 mattress height settings that can be adjusted depending on our child. Set it at its highest setting during the newborn months and lower it as your child starts to pull up and stand. It converts to a toddler bed with our conversion kit (sold separately) and daybed. Add our wooden bed frame (sold separately) to convert it into a full-size bed. The Julienne is available in upholstered and non-upholstered versions. The Antique Mist and Cloud finishes feature upholstery on the headboard constructed from beautiful, stain-resistant, woven, linen-like fabric. The Brushed White finish features a full-panel headboard without upholstery. At Evolur, safety is always our No.1 priority - Our cribs are built to the highest safety standards that meet/exceed those set by the CPSC, JPMA and ASTM. Each of our cribs undergoes rigorous testing by independent laboratories for compliance with all US and Canadian crib regulations.Pick coordinating pieces from our Evolur Julienne Collection like the double dresser, tall chest, hutch/bookcase and nightstand to create an timeless nursery. For the best mattress fit, we recommend any Dream on Me or Evolur standard, full-size, non-toxic, Greenguard certified crib mattress (sold separately).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great color more of a barn house white in my opinion on the wood. Great quality!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, well built, easy to assemble and very pleasing to the eye!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased the Evolur Julienne crib for our baby girl and we love it. The look of it and design is stunning and looks breathtaking in her dreamy nursery. The matching night stand, chest, and dresser was out of stock so we ordered the evolur Cheyenne furniture in antique grey mist and it matches well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No complaints just 1 tip
reviews.reviewText: Color great. Super sturdy. Came just how it’s advertised. Definitely worth the money. Wish they had more color options so I could’ve bought another one for my baby boy coming this week.Big tip would be buy a fabric that doesn’t fray or split or loosen from a local craft store to wrap the top rails. The crib is real wood and teethers will go to town on them. Don’t want baby eating wood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bed is absolutely gorgeous. Looks better in person and easy to assemble. Bought this for my daughter who will be having a baby soon. Delivery was done on probably one of the worst days for a delivery drivers it was poring down rain. Felt sorry for the delivery person.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and sturdy. I'm in love!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this crib in antique grey mist and it is absolutely stunning in person. Assembly is a bit difficult to complete by a single person (proven by the cursing and colorful language that emanated from my handy husband as he put it together last night,) but mostly because the individual pieces are so big. That being said, he managed to put it together successfully in about 45 minutes with no damage to the crib and minimal harm done to his ego.The crib is of sturdy construction and seems like it will stand up to all of our child's life stages. (However, we haven't reached the chewing stage yet, so we have yet to see if she's able to chew off all the finish on the rails like our son managed to do with his old crib.I love that this crib also converts to a toddler bed (toddler guard rail not included), a day bed, and a full size bed with the option of a headboard and footboard or just a headboard. This crib will definitely grow with our child and we hope it will be the only bed she ever needs!This is a beautiful addition to our nursery and we absolutely love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice crib but
reviews.reviewText: The crib itself is nice however the shipping process and actually receiving this product from the manufacturer is ridiculous, weeks over due/late. If you want this crib order as soon as you find out your expecting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Review from the Dad
reviews.reviewText: Arrived well packaged and assembled quickly into an impressive finished product. I am more than impressed.The wife just had to have this crib, and I knew it would be a pain to ship something this big. My fears were confirmed on shipping, but this is a product review so I will stick to the point.The crib goes together quickly and easily. I was all geared up for a project, and had less than 20 screws between me and a finished item on the to-do list. The crib was packed well and arrived unscathed despite the outward appearance of the shipping box.The joints fit together tightly and I had no issues with stripped screws or cheap hardware. The finished product is substantial, no loose or rickety connections. I have helped assemble cribs for my buddies that left me underwhelmed and glad I didn’t have any kids that would sleep in them. This crib came together nicely and appears as though it will more than outlive our use for it.Be prepared for shipping issues as the typical carriers won’t touch this one. The party responsible for the final leg of the journey was terrible. Amazon customer service was the only reason this crib arrived before our baby graduated from college.If your bride likes this crib, and if you can actually get it delivered, waste no time and order this one.
Beautiful crib & quality! Very pleased with the price too!
